title: Solidity Study
description: Some studies using Solidity to create Ethereum Contracts on Blockchain. Exploring smart contract development and DeFi concepts.

title: English Study
description: A web application to scrape URL contents looking for audios to train listening and option to click in words to see its definition.

title: National Geographic Mobile Concept
description: A concept mobile site of National Geographic. Responsive design study with mobile-first approach.

title: vue-ske
description: Skeleton for web apps with vue.js. A boilerplate project structure for quick Vue.js application setup.

title: reagindo
description: Initial studies with React. Learning project exploring React fundamentals and component patterns.

title: React Fifteen Puzzle
description: A simple fifteen puzzle game with React and Redux. Classic sliding puzzle implementation with state management.
